summary: I HAVE A1999 CHEVERLOT BLAZER,  IT WAS VERY DANGEROUS THE FRONT RIGHT TIRE WAS FALLING OFF.  I STOPPED WHEN I HEARD THE NOISE,AND HAD THE CAR TOWED.  IF I HAD NOT STOPPED WHEN I DID I WOULD HAVE BEEN IN A ACCIDENT WITH MY YOUNG DAUGHTER.  WHEN I TOOK IT BACK TO THE DEALER THEY ALSO TOLD ME THAT THE LEFT TIRE WAS DANGEROUS AND NEEDED TO BE FIXED>  IT COST ME 1200.00 AND I FEEL MY CAR IS A LEMON AND I WOULD LIKE SOME TYPE OF REIMBURSEMENT.
